00032 void SubBarInternet::xSetup()
00033 {
00034    //DAVID Setup Background;
00035    pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/SubBarBackground.png");
00036    setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00037    
00038    //DAVID Load BtnGraphic
00039    BtnGraphic[0]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Home.png");
00040    BtnGraphic[1]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Home-Active.png");
00041    BtnGraphic[2]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Previous.png");
00042    BtnGraphic[3]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Previous-Active.png");
00043    BtnGraphic[4]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Next.png");
00044    BtnGraphic[5]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Next-Active.png");
00045    BtnGraphic[6]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Search.png");
00046    BtnGraphic[7]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-Internet-Btn-Search-Active.png");
00047    
00048    //DAVID Internet Button
00049    SubBarBtnInternet_Home          =new SkinButton(this);
00050    SubBarBtnInternet_Previous      =new SkinButton(this);
00051    SubBarBtnInternet_Next            =new SkinButton(this);
00052    SubBarBtnInternet_Search        =new SkinButton(this);
00053    
00054    SubBarBtnInternet_Home->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[0],BtnGraphic[1]);
00055    SubBarBtnInternet_Home->setGeometry(5,-1,80,80);
00056    SubBarBtnInternet_Home->show();
00057    
00058    SubBarBtnInternet_Previous->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[2],BtnGraphic[3]);
00059    SubBarBtnInternet_Previous->setGeometry(84,0,60,80);
00060    SubBarBtnInternet_Previous->show();
00061    
00062    SubBarBtnInternet_Next->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[4],BtnGraphic[5]);
00063    SubBarBtnInternet_Next->setGeometry(144,0,60,80);
00064    SubBarBtnInternet_Next->show();
00065    
00066    SubBarBtnInternet_Search->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[6],BtnGraphic[7]);
00067    SubBarBtnInternet_Search->setGeometry(207,0,60,80);
00068    SubBarBtnInternet_Search->show();
00069    
00070 
00071 
00072   
00073 }
